title: Manischewitz Soup Mix
generatedText: In the mood for soup mix? You could try Manischewitz Soup Mix. This product has 18 ingredients (in our experience: the fewer ingredients, the better!) This product contains 2 ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid. One serving of this product provides 15 calories, 0g grams of fat, 1g grams of protein, and 3g grams of carbs. At about $3.89, this product is rather expensive.

ingredients.name: food color
ingredients.description: Color additives are tricky - both colors that we might perceive as natural (e.g. fruit juice and turmeric) and artificial colors (e.g. Red 3) might turn up on a food label under "artifical color" or "color added." This makes it difficult to know how safe these colorings are, since you do not know exactly what you are consuming. The FDA is wise not to make a distinction, however, because the process of extracting natural colors is far from natural and these substances are not necessarily safer!

ingredients.name: spices
ingredients.description: "Spice" can refer to any number of spices. If you are allergic to a spice, you will need to call the manufacturer to find out which spices are included. Things like wheat and sugar have to be listed separately, so "spice" is safe for gluten free diets.

ingredientList: Sugar, Salt, Monosodium Glutamate, Onion, Vegetable Shortening (Partially Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil), Spices, Garlic, Annatto Color
